rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment does not contain high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports cases in animals, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation of the specified types.
Reports case numbers/locations, not capability or preparedness.
The segment reports the number of animal cases, not prices or economic metrics.
The segment reports case numbers in animals, not speculation about future relief.
No direct quote or clearly attributed statement providing a dominant frame.
